com.facebook.buck.parser

Class ParseContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.ParseContext

  • @Immutable
public class ParseContext
extends Object
    Context for parsing build target names. Fully-qualified target names are parsed the same regardless of the context.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ParseContext.Type 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ParseContext forBaseName(String baseName)
      Used when parsing target names relative to another target, such as in a build file.
      static ParseContext forVisibilityArgument()
      Used when parsing target names in the visibility argument to a build rule.
      static ParseContext fullyQualified()
      Used when parsing fully-qualified target names only, such as from the command line.

      String getBaseNameWithSlash()
